sub_title: Enabling valuable connections between brands and customers  | B2B | Midmarket and Enterprise | Leader in digital marketing and sales
summary:
Energetic digital marketing and sales leader in connecting business and technology. Using agile values and principles I help brands with the development of meaningful connections with customers.

I have more than a decade of experience in leading the development of a (cloud based) marketing and sales technology stack for VodafoneZiggo, Exact Software, and Samsung Europe. It is my ambition to lead complex digital and data-driven transformations and drive valuable outcomes.

Hobbies
I believe that an active lifestyle helps me to be competitive, disciplined, energetic and motivated. That is why have adopted endurance training as a hobby and race Ironman triathlons for fun!

Get in touch! Send an email to mark.stadhouders@gmail.com.

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

awards.title: Samsung European Best Practice CRM platform MySamsung
awards.description: The award is issued by Samsung for the best digital initiative that leads to more direct contact. My team built a social CRM platform capturing consumer data via MySamsung and using this data to communicate with consumers with better precision.

projects.title: Consumer centric concepting
projects.description: I introduced the consumer centric concepting framework to my CE marketing team in a series of workshops, trainings and consumer feedback sessions. As Samsung is moving from marketing product features to becoming a lovemark, the marketing team learned the tools to prepare better briefings, find better insights, and address more target groups. The program was developed by Peggy Bakkum and Saatchi and Saatchi.

contributors.headline: Enabling valuable connections between brands and customers  | B2B | Midmarket and Enterprise | Leader in digital marketing and sales

projects.title: Exact Live, the largest business event in the Netherlands
projects.description: Marketing lead for Exact Live 2017 edition. For this edition my team developed a connected digital journey spanning Facebook, Linkedin, website, app, and nurture campaign. We overachieved all previous editions with more registrations, more visitors and higher engagement.

contributors.headline: Enabling valuable connections between brands and customers  | B2B | Midmarket and Enterprise | Leader in digital marketing and sales

projects.title: Samsung European CRM platform
projects.description: I lead the development of a pan-European CRM platform. Chosen as best practice by Samsung HQ, work included identifying and structuring the IT and data landscape, selecting tooling (Selligent), initiating bespoke development (by Emakina and cheel), leading international development teams, and planning email life cycle strategies (by Yourzine). The result is a fully integrated consumer proposition called MySamsung, unified database structure, a multi-channel campaign management tool, dealer portal, promotional management platform for registering cashbacks and promotions, and personalized email campaigns.

Seasoned MarCom Leader, Digital & MarTech Expert

projects.title: Samsung end-of-year activation campaign
projects.description: As part of my CE marketing responsibilities, I lead the introduction of a 360 consumer activation campaign together with Media Markt. Being the main sponsor of Gekkenhuis, Samsung offered to win a trip to space via SXC (www.spacexc.com) or win a selection of Samsung products. Customers could participate in an online game and via an in-store windblowing capsule. The campaign was seeded in social media, websites, TV, radio and in-store with innovative tube displays and branded jackets. The campaign resulted in more than average media value and attention for Samsung.

contributors.headline: Enabling valuable connections between brands and customers  | B2B | Midmarket and Enterprise | Leader in digital marketing and sales

projects.title: Samsung annual dealershows
projects.description: As part of my CE marketing responsibilities, I headed the team and agencies (Quince) that developed the most impactful series of Samsung events and Dealershows. Including events at Life After Football, Miljonairfair, HON (now Techdata), and new product introduction shows at Kasteel Hooge Vuursche and Endemol studios. The Smarter Living dealershow in the Endemol studios was the most prestigious event in years with landscaped product demo areas and a central villa for customer meetings in the middle. It resulted in the fastest sell-in of Samsung's new range of TVs in 2012.

contributors.headline: Enabling valuable connections between brands and customers  | B2B | Midmarket and Enterprise | Leader in digital marketing and sales

profile_positions.description:
Available per 1st May 2023 - seeking commercial leadership role.

I help B2B organisations with data driven performance marketing strategies that boost brand engagement, acquires more customers and increases customer lifetime value.
profile_positions.title: VP Marketing and Sales

profile_positions.description:
I led the NL mid-market team bringing in new customers on the Marketing Cloud suite. Marketing Cloud 360 seamlessly turns moments into trusted customer relationships by creating a single source of the truth, a personalized customer experience, new insights through unified analytics and workflows for collaborating across teams.

Followed Salesforce leadership, MEDDIC sales processes and coaching courses.
profile_positions.title: Regional Vice President Marketing Cloud

profile_positions.description:
Marketing Operations focuses on making marketing (stakeholders) efficient, agile and data driven (people, process, technology focus).

1. Digital Technology: including the evaluation, implementation, and management of marketing technology systems such as Salesforce automation and CRM.
2. Data: including consumption and understanding of the data that prospects and customers create during the buying journey. Such as making sure marketing automation data is being properly collected and connected with other CRM systems. Create a solid master data management foundation and governance.
3. Alignment and agility: including usage of the data and technology by others on the marketing team. In addition, marketing operations runs agile marketing alignment and campaign ROI.

Courses: Certified SAFe 4 Agilist, Gladwell Academy, 2019
profile_positions.title: Head Of Marketing Operations B2B, Cluster Lead Digital Acceleration

profile_positions.description:
Exact Cloud Solutions (Exact Online) - lead the marketing technology stack for Exact.com, team of 12 FTE and several external agencies:

1. Started a new DevOps team to integrate 150+ global sites into one private cloud environment at Basefarm
2. Lead the rollout of Eloqua enterprise edition bringing CRM nurturing programs into the buying funnel
3. Lead the design and development of integrated marketing funnels for Exact Live (business software event)
4. Defining data first strategy for data driven performance marketing using Google Analytics Premium as a basis for personalisation
5. Last but not least; marketing lead for Exact Live. The biggest Business Software event in the Netherlands. As the sixth edition, the marketing program overperformed with over 8000 registrations and 5000 visitors.

Courses: Certified Scrum Master (CSM, April 2016), Agile coaching by Prowareness, and Exact Leadership program (October 2017)
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Marketing Automation, Exact.com and campaigns

profile_positions.description:
I advised brands on data driven performance marketing strategies, boosting brand engagement and increasing customer lifetime value #thejourneystartshere @ www.merlincreatives.com.

Assignments included: 
1. Postcode loterij - Assessment and consultancy on CRM technology stack, data processes, and organisational setup.
2. Yves Rocher - running the sales driven newsletter campaigns.
3. NBWM.NL - selection and implementation of Marketo marketing automation platform.
4. Exact.com - merge 150+ websites into one domain and on a single private cloud (Basefarm)
profile_positions.title: Founder and Digital Director

profile_positions.description:
As part of the strategy and pitch team, I lead the CRM expertise centre in The Netherlands. Its aim is to deliver an exceptional brand experience at each point of direct interaction between brands and consumers. Through high grade tools such as Selligent, strategies and CRM campaigns Emakina delivers the right message to each unique customer, at the right moment, through the right channel.

Responsibilities included:
1. Develop and lead the CRM proposition for Emakina called Emakina /Direct. Including directing project managers, developers and designers. 
2. Acquiring clients in B2B and B2C with CRM Strategy, concepts, and programs including tooling selections (Selligent). As pitch team lead for CRM acquired Unilever Food Solutions (UFS) and Auping (B2B), as well as Rituals, Yves Rocher, BSH, Suitsupply, and AD (B2C). Including program management in initiating phases.
profile_positions.title: Director CRM Emakina/Direct

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for all multichannel Direct Marketing innovations for the Benelux market across all product groups, including (social) CRM and commerce; create tooling, build Customer Life Cycles, manage the Samsung datawarehouse, and develop digital platforms. Transforming Samsung into a consumer centric marketing leader in the CE market. Our locally developed CRM suite (MySamsung community, training portal, promotool, based on Selligent) has been selected by Samsung EHQ as European best practice for roll out to other major European countries. 

I headed a team of Product Marketeers, Channel Managers, Content Manager Smart TV, Product Specialist, and Market Insights Analysts, for the product groups TV and Audio. With a focus on Dutch retail and etail market.

Responsibilities included:
1. Leading the launch of the Samsung online store (Hybris) in the Benelux market.
2. Initiating and leading the development of a European social CRM platform (MySamsung), data warehouse development, Marketing automation tool (Selligent), online data capture services, insights tooling (Qlikview), and Customer Life Cycles campaigning (selected agency Yourzine).
3. Managing a team of 10 to drive sell in and sell out for the Dutch retail channels through channel sales and pricing plans, retail trade marketing programs (instore displays, POS materials, ambassadors, and fairs), digital and marcom.

Course: Saatchi & Saatchi Lovebrand Academy (March 2012), Samsung marketing training (October 2012)

Social Responsibility Project: 
Initiator Samsung Runs4Youth. A customer relationship program developed together with ex-olympic athlete Marko Koers. Aim is to run and raise funds for a good cause; in 2012 this was the Johan Cruyff Foundation (http://www.cruyff-foundation.org/schoolplein14/) while in 2013 we ran for the Samsung Innovation Fund (http://www.onderwijsinnovatiefonds.nl/).
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager, Head of CRM

profile_positions.description:
As Manager Strategy I advised the Board and the management team about projects designed to sustain long term growth. This resulted in a map update program, tracking and tracing services for the B2B market, and M&A proposals. I returned back to the Netherlands to increase sales in the Benelux market, through retailers like Media Markt & Saturn, Dixons, Scheer & Foppen, Halfords, Carrefour, Fnac, Colruyt, VandenBorre and etailers like Coolblue, Bol and Wehkamp. Managed a team of account managers, distributors, merchandisers and PR agency. Tripled Navigon's GfK market share before the brand was integrated into the Garmin organization.

Responsibilities included:
1. Managing two distributors and a team of account managers while leading the development of pricing plans, sales plans, and retail/retail channel plans.
2. Driving sell out through retail trade marketing programs (instore display, POS materials, ambassadors, training, and fairs), PR and social media.
3. Locally developed a social online platform “GirlsGadgets” targeted to women to open new segments for navigation products.
4. Tripled Navigon’s volume market share to 11% after which the company was acquired by Garmin.

Course: German speaking courses
profile_positions.title: Benelux Country Manager Sales & Marketing

profile_positions.description:
As GM I was global P&L responsible for the business unit Content & Services, delivering location based services like realtime traffic information, weather forecasts, downloadable navigation voices, speed cameras, and maps. Managed a team of 16 including software engineers, content and product managers. Portfolio was launched under name TomTom PLUS in May 2005. As the first mass-market location based service platform, it paved the way for new innovative services like TomTom HOME and HD Traffic.

Responsibilities included:
1. Managed a team of Product Managers, Software engineers, and Content Managers as separate unit within TomTom (totaled 16 FTE). 
2. Designed online platform TomTom Plus for selecting and activating services.
3. Managed the selection and contracting of key international content partners in the area of real-time traffic information, safety (speed) cameras, navigation maps, navigation voices, weather reports, scenic routes, audio books, and branded points of interests. Includes developing business cases, market analyses, customer research programs and commercial (online) offers. All launched under the name TomTom PLUS with estimated gross revenue of 6 million Euro in its first year.

Extra in-company courses: Leadership
profile_positions.title: General Manager Content & Services

profile_positions.description:
I started under the Dutchtone brand as marketing manager to expand the portfolio of consumer value added services. I launched and managed SMS, MMS, and GPRS (Orange World) services like ringtones, games, infotainment and online tools. I was also part of the re-branding team to change Dutchtone service portfolio into Orange, later acquired by T-Mobile.

Responsibilities included:
1. Team lead (team of five) for data services portfolio delivering product marketing year plan including strategic proposition development, selection and acquisition of content providers, forecasting of handset portfolio, preparing communication agency briefings, steering product development, planning POS material, and developing Internet site supporting the services. Working in close cooperation with Orange international organisation to align global proposition “Orange World” totalling 5 million Euro gross revenue in 2004.
2. Initiated, launched, and marketed complete portfolio of SMS, Internet and voice content services targeted at youth market.

Extra in-company courses: Brand Management by Erasmus, Leadership by Krauthammer, Effective Negotiations by NCOI, Effective writing (see book The pyramid principle, Barbara Mint)
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager Services

volunteer_experiences.description: I am the initiator of Samsung Runs4Youth. This is a customer relationship program developed with ex-olympic athlete Marko Koers. Aim is to run for a good cause; in 2012 this was the Johan Cruyff Foundation (http://www.cruyff-foundation.org/schoolplein14/) while in 2013 we ran for the Samsung Innovation Fund (http://www.onderwijsinnovatiefonds.nl/).
